# Tests -C flag to change working directory before running commands

muxt -C a/b/c generate --use-receiver-type=T
muxt -C a/b/c check

exec go -C a/b/c build

-- a/b/c/go.mod --
module pack

go 1.18
-- a/b/c/main.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

var (
	//go:embed *.gohtml
	templateFiles embed.FS

	templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templateFiles, "*"))
)

func main() {}
-- a/b/c/index.gohtml --
{{define "GET / Index()"}}
<h1>hello</h1>
{{end}}
-- a/b/c/routes.go --
package main

type T struct{}

func (T) Index() string { return "hello" }
